metadata.Title: CVE-2021-29943 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: When using ConfigurableInternodeAuthHadoopPlugin for authentication, Apache Solr versions prior to 8.8.2 would forward/proxy distributed requests using server credentials instead of original client credentials. This would result in incorrect authorization resolution on the receiving hosts.

criterions.comment: lucene-solr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
